body_html:
Can you try removing PYTHON_LIB_PATH setting from .tf_configure.bazelrc file in the root tensorflow directory? (this file is generated when running ./configure)

Why I think that might work:
We look for pip packages in location specified when running ./configure. This location is stored as value of PYTHON_LIB_PATH in .tf_configure.bazelrc file. If PYTHON_LIB_PATH is not set, then we seem to fallback to PYTHONPATH
(https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/py/python_configure.bzl#L177).

(https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/py/python_configure.bzl#L177).
body:
Can you try removing PYTHON_LIB_PATH setting from .tf_configure.bazelrc file in the root tensorflow directory? (this file is generated when running ./configure)

Why I think that might work:
We look for pip packages in location specified when running ./configure. This location is stored as value of PYTHON_LIB_PATH in .tf_configure.bazelrc file. If PYTHON_LIB_PATH is not set, then we seem to fallback to PYTHONPATH
(https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/third_party/py/python_configure.bzl#L177).
